GSD.product_version: versions from v3.9 to before v5.16.19
GSD.description:
pinctrl: nomadik: Add missing of_node_put() in nmk_pinctrl_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.19 by commit 9511c6018cd772668def8b034bc67269847e591a, it was introduced in version v3.9 by commit 32e67eee670e1254ee5ab41e2f454680acb9c17c. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: pinctrl: nomadik: Add missing of_node_put() in nmk_pinctrl_probe
